name: Devour Hope
description:
A Little boy named Edric sadly had his family killed in a fire and now has moved in with his aunt and uncle. But what comes next will scar Edric for the rest of his life. 

Devs Note: This game was lazily put together since I have no time with both work and school but I thank my lovely lovely friend for helping me out with the portraits. I Hope you enjoy the game somewhat!
